items: Added interactive stats with clickable elements linking to dedicated stats page
Relocated stats page to /game-stats/ to avoid authentication conflicts
Enhanced main page with improved click areas for roadmap cards
Added prominent Download Now buttons for better conversion
Improved visual feedback on hover interactions

entries.summary: Initial website launch with core infrastructure.
items: Initial landing page and bug reporting pipeline
DreamHost deploy workflow with rsync automation
Netlify function for GitHub issue creation
Health check system with automated validation
